questions.text: What did Rita Repulsa steal from each crime she committed?
questions.explanation:
Gold.

	Rita, played by Elizabeth Banks, was collecting gold to help her build Goldar. Goldar was the giant monster that she used to fight against the Rangers at the end of the movie. She started out stealing gold teeth from a person she killed, and eventually stole larger and larger chunks of gold from each person or place she attacked. On the news she was deemed the "Gold Killer".

questions.text: What did Jason take from the rival school early in the movie?
questions.explanation:
A bull.

	The bull was the mascot for the rival school. He broke into the school and stole the mascot. Eventually he was chased down by police and ended up wrecking his truck. He was arrested, thrown off the football team and ended up serving Saturday detention every week.

questions.text: Which Ranger did Rita try to convince to betray the rest of the team?
questions.explanation:
Trini.

	The green and gold clad Rita appeared in Trini's bedroom and tried to force her into betraying the other Rangers. Rita appeared to float above Trini's bed and ask if Trini knew who she was. This was before Trini had learned how to morph, yet Rita knew she was the Yellow Ranger. Trini knew who Rita was because Zordon had shown them a vision of the future where she was attacking the Earth.

questions.text: Billy found the Zeo Crystal when no one else could. Where was it?
questions.explanation:
Under a doughnut shop.

	Billy studied maps, graphs and charts along with anything else he could find to help him locate the crystal. Billy built a map with string and other plot points to help him pinpoint the location of the crystal, it ended up being under a modern day Krispy Kreme store.

questions.text: Who was the first morphed Ranger that appeared on screen?
questions.explanation:
Zordon.

	The opening scene had text showing "Planet Earth: Cenozoic Era" and slowly faded in on the Red Ranger with a cracked helmet. He was laying on the ground breathing heavily. It turned out to be Zordon (played by Bryan Cranston). They were fighting Rita and he was the only Ranger left alive on his team. He briefly saw the Yellow Ranger before she died, and then Rita in her Green Ranger outfit appeared. Then the movie flashed to modern day.

questions.text: Billy's mom gave Jason permission to take her van.
questions.explanation:
False.

	After Jason dropped Billy off at the mine, there is a scene where Billy is talking out loud to his deceased father. During that chat he apologizes to his dad, saying that he forgot to tell his mom that he was taking the van. He said that he thought it was ok though since he was now telling his dad.

questions.text: Who was the first of the teens to see the power coins?
questions.explanation:
Trini.

	After Billy used his homemade explosives to blast a section out of the wall of the mine, it was Trini who first noticed that there was "something" in the now exposed rock face. After she said that, Zack broke the coins out of the rock and Jason tried to get Zack to admit that Billy found them since he had located them, but each of them still ended up leaving with one. They were chased by mine security and ended up crashing the van when they were hit by a train.

questions.text: Who pulled Rita's frozen body out of the ocean?
questions.explanation:
Jason's dad.

	Jason's father was a commercial fisherman. While out of a fishing trip his boat pulled the body out of the ocean. She had been there for millions of years; what timing that she was found the same day the power coins were uncovered! He called in the the "dead" body and left the ship. Rita awakened and killed the police officer who was called in to investigate.

questions.text: Jason was the only one of the Rangers who couldn't morph on their first attempt.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The Rangers had an estimated 11 days to prepare to battle Rita, but none of them were able to access the morphing grid. Because of this they all had to train without the armor that morphing provided.  Billy was the first Ranger to morph, doing so when he stepped in to break up a fight between Zack and Jason.

questions.text: Which Ranger had a sick mother?
questions.explanation:
Zack.

	There were several scenes with Zack and his mother, though her exact illness isn't known. During a bonding moment around a campfire Zack told the other Rangers about his mom and said that he is too scared to go home some nights because he can't stand the thought of losing her. Billy's secret was about his love of country music; Trini spoke about how she liked being the new girl with no one getting to know her, she also admitted to having girlfriend troubles; Jason said everyone knew who he was already and he had no secrets and Kimberly chose not to talk about her secret.
